explanation: [0-0] A hand wearing a blue glove is holding a mobile phone with its back facing up, showing the bottom of the phone. There's a tool at the bottom of the phone. In the background, some tools and a blue workbench can be seen.

[0-3] Then the tool is taken out of the screen. The gloved hand turns the phone over with its screen facing forward. The phone screen is black and displays nothing. A thumb is pressing the power button.

[3-5] Next, an Apple logo appears on the phone screen.

[5-9] Subsequently, the Apple logo disappears, and the screen turns black again. The word "SAMSUNG" gradually emerges on the screen. A hand pats the phone, and the word "SAMSUNG" turns into the Apple logo again.
